analysis-of-generalization-performance--.text: Analysis of Generalization Performance - Researchers aim to achieve good generalization by making accurate predictions for new data. To quantify this performance, they often use a separate set of data known as a test set. Describe how the generalization performance of a model for data points can be quantitatively assessed using a test set.
